mapper.update: update ${tabName} info set info.STATUSID = #{clientStatusVoteVO.statusId}, info.classid = #{clientStatusVoteVO.classId}, info.UPDATETIME = UNIX_TIMESTAMP(now()), info.PROMOTORID = #{clientStatusVoteVO.operaId} where info.kzid = #{clientStatusVoteVO.kzId} and info.companyid = #{clientStatusVoteVO.companyId} and info.ISDEL = 0
mapper.select: SELECT ${type} ID, COUNT(1) NUM, KZID FROM ${tabName} info WHERE info.COMPANYID = #{companyId} AND info.ISDEL = 0 AND ${type} IS NOT NULL AND ( INSTR(#{kzIds}, info.KZID) != 0 ) GROUP BY ${type}
